Flow.description: This step no longer triggers the Implementation | After Update | Create Add-On Opp flow, it creates the Opp and AC again and updates the Payroll Provider on the created Opp. It also sends the initial EPS email- 7/8/24 JI Added step at the end to update the initiating Imp.Payroll_Integration field to "Yes". Removed create Opp and AC elements, this button now triggers Implementation | After Update | Create Add-On Opp
Flow.interviewLabel: Implementation | After Update | Create Add-On Opp {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Implementation | Button | Create Add-On Opp

recordCreates.name: Copy_1_of_Create_Case_for_Payroll
recordCreates.label: Copy 1 of Create Case for Payroll

recordUpdates.name: Copy_1_of_Update_Payroll_Integration_and_Payroll_Provider_Field_on_Imp
recordUpdates.label: Copy 1 of Update Payroll Integration and Payroll Provider Field on Imp

recordUpdates.name: Update_Payroll_Integration_Field_on_Imp
recordUpdates.label: Update Payroll Integration Field on Imp

fields.name: Exists
fields.fieldText: A payroll integration opportunity already exists for this plan.

fields.name: fundAcctDisplay
fields.fieldText: Does the client want to use multiple funding accounts?

fields.name: payrollProviderDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Please choose a payroll provider before requesting integration.


If you do not see the correct Payroll Provider, reach out to the Payroll team to add the new Payroll Provider.

fields.name: errorMessage
fields.fieldText: You must enter a payroll provider to proceed.

fields.name: noMultipleFundingDisplay
fields.fieldText:
We are not able to support payroll integration with multiple funding accounts.


Please let the client know we will not be able to set up payroll integration.

fields.name: ConfirmationMessage
fields.fieldText:
Your Payroll Integration request for {!Get_Implementation.Account__r.Name} has been submitted successfully. Please reach out to the Payroll team for further updates.



Please Click "Finish" to Exit

textTemplates.name: desc
textTemplates.text: No plan sponsor was found when searching the payroll integration opportunity. Please create associated contact record for plan sponsor and link it to the opportunity, then send the Initial Email manually. Once the associated contact record is created and linked, the subsequent emails will send automatically.

textTemplates.name: faultDesc
textTemplates.text: There was an error when the automation tried to send the initial payroll integration email. Please manually send the initial email to: {!emailsToSend}.

textTemplates.name: faultSubj
textTemplates.text: Error Sending Initial EPS Email for: {!Get_Implementation.Account__r.Name}

textTemplates.name: gustoCaseDesc
textTemplates.text: A new Gusto integration was requested. No initial email was auto-sent, please follow up manually.

textTemplates.name: subject
textTemplates.text: No Sponsor Found for Email Alerts for {!Get_Implementation.Account__r.Name}
